name: assemblage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] formal a collection of things or a group of people or animals: A varied assemblage of birds was probing the mud for food.
[ U ] the process of joining or putting things together

a collection of people or things that are brought together for some reason
art An assemblage is also a work of art that is made of different things put together.
